title: Drawing, "Designs for two doorknockers", ca. 1780
medium: Pen and black ink, brush and rose watercolor wash, on white laid paper
inscribed:
Inscription, pen and black ink, at left: Bouton profils Heurtoir ou Marteaux vu De face; in pen and black ink at right: bouton profils

Inscribed, graphite, verso: heur toises / 1eme serie etc. / 24 e cahier -planche 4
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: Design for two doorknockers, scroll-shaped, decorated with acanthus leaf motifs. Bottom fills center of S-curve, example at right. Framing lines.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Designs for two doorknockers", ca. 1780.
ca. 1780. Pen and black ink, brush and rose watercolor wash, on white laid paper. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1911-28-184.
